page.title: 09SEAFIELD BOWLING CLUB
page.content:
{SEAFIELD BOWLING CLUB
In 1883 there was a bowling club formed.It is in the Links near the Rope Walk.It is called Seafield Bowling Club.It was really opened in 1884 on the 9th of May.We spoke to the club secretary who had been there for thirty years and lived nearby. He said that it cost 30 Pounds for under 65yrs old and for over 65 it cost 20 Pounds. It cost 10 Pounds for non competitors. I asked how many members they had. He told me that there were 136 members. The green is made from natural grass and is used for club and national tournaments. The club also takes part in district competitions. The members use wooden, Henselite and Tynolite Bowls.
